article_title: Houthis claim hit on US container ship in Red Sea
sentence: On  7  October,  hundreds  of  Palestinian  gunmen  from  Gaza  infiltrated  southern  Israel,  where  they  killed  around  1,200  people  -  mostly  civilians  -  and  took  250  others  hostage.

article_title: Houthis claim hit on US container ship in Red Sea
sentence: Israel  responded  by  launching  a  military  campaign  in  Gaza,  during  which  more  than  26,900  people  -  most  of  them  women  and  children  -  have  been  killed,  according  to  the  health  ministry  there  which  is  controlled  by  the  Hamas  group.

article_title: Houthis claim hit on US container ship in Red Sea
sentence: Additional  reporting  by  Josh  Cheetham,  BBC  VerifyCorrection  13th  February:  This  article  wrongly  reported  that  about  1,300  people  had  been  killed  following  the  7th  October  attack  by  Hamas.

article_title: Houthis claim hit on US container ship in Red Sea
sentence: This  was  based  on  counting  those  who  later  died  from  their  injuries  in  addition  to  the  figure  of  more  than  1,200.
